content: country comfort mittens crochet pattern by in stitches materials 1 full skein of loops & threads country loom yarn j 6 00mm hook or size required to obtain gauge stitch marker yarn needle to weave in ends gauge 2 x 2 = approximately 5 5 stitches and 5 5 row stitch guide mc - magic_ring chain - chain slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet decrease - a decrease stitch single_crochet 2 stitches together double_crochet - double_crochet fpdc - front post double_crochet bpdc - back post double_crochet notes beginning chains chain 1 throughout the mitt or the chain 2 for the cuff do not count as a stitch start your first stitch in the same space as the beginning chain of each round unless otherwise instructed the use of a stitch marker in the first stitch of each round will help identify where to join your stitch at the end of each round pattern instructions make a magic_ring mc chain 1 round 1 - work 6 single_crochet s into mc pull tight to close slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet to close 6 round 2 - chain 1 2 single_crochet in each stitch around slip_stitch to 1st stitch to close 12 round 3 - chain 1 2sc in first stitch 1sc in next stitch repeat around then slip_stitch to 1st stitch to close 18 round 4 - chain 1 1sc in the next 5 stitches 2sc in the next stitch repeat around then slip_stitch to 1st stitch to close 21 round 5 - chain 1 single_crochet in all stitches around slip_stitch to 1st stitch to close 21 country comfort mittens page 1 of 3 copyright © 2018 in stitches crochet by sl **take this opportunity to weave in the yarn tail from the beginning mc** rounds 6 through 14 - repeat round 5 note if a shorter mitt is required remove a round/rounds from this top section if a longer mitt is required add a round/rounds to this top section you can also add/remove rounds before the cuff as an option depending on the type of personalized fit you need - see after round 19 below round 15 **thumb hole round** - right hand mitt - chain 1 single_crochet in the next 5 stitches chain 7 skip 5 stitches single_crochet in the next 11 stitches slip_stitch to 1st stitch to close - left hand mitt - chain 1 single_crochet in the next 2 stitches chain 7 skip 5 stitches single_crochet in the next 14 stitches slip_stitch to 1st stitch to close round 16 - chain 1 - for the right hand mitt single_crochet in the next 5 stitches single_crochet into each of the 7 chains make sure the hook goes through both top loops of the stitch single_crochet in the next 11 stitches then slip_stitch to 1st stitch to close 23 - for the left hand mitt single_crochet in the next 2 stitches single_crochet into each of the 7 chains make sure the hook goes through both top loops of the stitch single_crochet
